name: Tower Pull Defense
description:
You are a mage and have to use the power of the magic crystals to protect your ancients. To do so, you have to link to your crystals and control, but be carefull, once joined together, you can't unlink.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by USPGameDev.

USPGameDev is a study group of game development from Universidade de São Paulo.

Source: https://gitlab.com/uspgamedev/gmtk-2021

Developers:

Gabriel Mota: https://gmota.itch.io/

Matheus Lima Cunha: darknesscatt.itch.io/

Otavio Felipe de Freitas: offreitas.itch.io/

Joao Pedro Cabral Miranda: joao-pedro-cabral.itch.io/

Gabriel Sarti: https://lordanb.itch.io/
